name: B. Array Cloning Technique
statement:
You are given an array a of n integers. Initially there is only one copy
of the given array.You can do operations of two types: Choose any array
and clone it. After that there is one more copy of the chosen array.
Swap two elements from two copies (maybe in the same copy) on any
positions. You need to find the minimal number of operations needed to
obtain a copy where all elements are equal.
